onChange.script:
import traceback
	try:
		if self.custom.func_refresh:
			data = self.custom.sql_data
			#ID
			self.custom.RegistrationData.human_id = data.getValueAt(0,'human_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.participant_id = self.params.participant_id
			#Name
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'first_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = data.getValueAt(0,'first_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'middle_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = data.getValueAt(0,'middle_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'last_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = data.getValueAt(0,'last_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'suffix_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name = data.getValueAt(0,'suffix_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'nick_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = data.getValueAt(0,'nick_name')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id = data.getValueAt(0,'gender_id')
			#Numbers
			active = data.getValueAt(0,'time_retired')
			if active != None: #Participant is not active if time retired has a date
				self.custom.RegistrationData.active = 0
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.active = 1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.case_manager_id = data.getValueAt(0,'case_manager_id')
			ssn = data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[3:5] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[5:]
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn = ssn
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id = data.getValueAt(0,'ssn_quality_id')
			dob = data.getValueAt(0,'dob')
			if dob == None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = None
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = system.date.fromMillis(system.date.toMillis(dob))
			
			self.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality = data.getValueAt(0,'dob_quality_id')

			#Status	
			self.custom.RegistrationData.race_id = data.getValueAt(0,'race_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id = data.getValueAt(0,'ethnicity_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id = data.getValueAt(0,'veteran_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id = data.getValueAt(0,'disability_id')
			time_deceased = data.getValueAt(0,'time_deceased')
			if time_deceased == None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.time_deceased = None
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.time_deceased = system.date.toMillis(time_deceased)
			#Address
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.street = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.city = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.state = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.zip_code = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'street') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.street = data.getValueAt(0,'street')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'city') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.city = data.getValueAt(0,'city')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'state') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.state = data.getValueAt(0,'state')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code') != None:
				if int(data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code')) > 0:
					self.custom.RegistrationData.zip_code = data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code')
			#Contact info
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.alt_phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.email = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'phone') != None:
				phone = data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.phone = phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone') != None:
				alt_phone = data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.alt_phone = alt_phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'email') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.email = data.getValueAt(0,'email')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'communication_type_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.insurance_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'insurance_type_id')
			#Emergency Contact info
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone') != None:
				ec_phone = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone = ec_phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_email') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_email')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_type_id')
			#Misc info			
			self.custom.RegistrationData.family_id = data.getValueAt(0,'family_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id = data.getValueAt(0,'hoh_relationship_id')
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.employer = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.school = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.congregation = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'employer') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.employer = data.getValueAt(0,'employer')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'school') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.school = data.getValueAt(0,'school')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'congregation') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.congregation = data.getValueAt(0,'congregation')
		
		
		
		#set the refresh trigger to false when finished
		self.custom.func_refresh = False
	
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Personal Detail Edit view.custom.func_refresh")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

config.expression:
'Active:' +
{view.custom.RegistrationData.active} +
', Case Mgr:' +
{view.custom.RegistrationData.case_manager_id}+
', ssn:' +
{view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn} +
', ssn qual:' +
{view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id} +
', dob:' +
{view.custom.RegistrationData.dob} +
', dob qual:' + 
{view.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality}

config.script:
import traceback
	import re
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		#General Info
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		human_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.human_id
		participant_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.participant_id
		#First Row		
		first_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.first_name
		middle_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name
		last_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.last_name
		suffix_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name
		nick_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name
		gender_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id
		#Second Row
		if self.view.custom.RegistrationData.active == 0:#Retire Inactive Participant
			active = system.date.now()
		else:
			active = None
		case_manager_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.case_manager_id
		ssn = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn
		ssn_quality_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id
		dob = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob
		dob_quality_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality
		#Third Row
		race_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.race_id
		ethnicity_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id
		veteran_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id
		disability_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id
		time_deceased = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.time_deceased
		#Fourth Row
		street = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.street
		city = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.city
		state = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.state
		zip_code = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.zip_code
		#Fifth Row
		phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.phone
		alt_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.alt_phone
		email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.email
		communication_type_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id
		insurance_type_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.insurance_type_id
		#Sixth Row
		emergency_contact_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name
		emergency_contact_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone
		emergency_contact_email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email
		emergency_contact_type_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id
		#Seventh Row
		family_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.family_id
		hoh_relationship_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id
		employer = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.employer
		school = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.school
		congregation = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.congregation
				
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if None in [human_id,participant_id,first_name,last_name,gender_id,dob_quality_id,ssn_quality_id]:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Null Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving (Null Error)."
		elif None in [race_id,ethnicity_id,veteran_id,hoh_relationship_id]:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Null Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving (Null Error)."
		elif first_name.strip() == "":
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('First Name Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant First Name before saving."
		elif last_name.strip() == "":
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Last Name Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Last Name before saving."
		elif gender_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Gender before saving."
		elif ssn_quality_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the SSN Quality before saving."
		elif dob_quality_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Date of Birth Quality before saving."
		elif race_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Race before saving."
		elif ethnicity_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Ethnicity before saving."
		elif veteran_id < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Veteran Status before saving."
		elif hoh_relationship_id < 0:
				valid = False
				#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
				error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Family Relationship before saving."
		else:
			valid = True
			system.perspective.print('Data Valid')
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:

			## Convert Phone numbers to numeric value only
			phone = normalize.phone(phone)
			alt_phone = normalize.phone(alt_phone)
			emergency_contact_phone = normalize.phone(emergency_contact_phone)
			
			#SSN validation and normalization
			ssn = normalize.ssn(ssn)
			#system.perspective.print(ssn)
			
			#DOB validation	
			try:
				dob = system.date.parse(dob)
				#system.perspective.print('DOB sucessfully parsed: ' + str(dob))
			except:
				dob = '1900-01-01 00:00:00'
				#system.perspective.print('DOB set to default: ' + str(dob))
				
			### Create transaction
			transactionFailed = False
			txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
			try:
				#Update the Human Data
				path = "Participants/Personal/PersonalDetailUpdate"
				parameters = {"first_name":first_name,
							"middle_name":middle_name,
							"last_name":last_name,
							"suffix_name":suffix_name,
							"nick_name":nick_name,
							"dob":dob,
							"dob_quality_id":dob_quality_id,
							"ssn":ssn,
							"ssn_quality_id":ssn_quality_id,
							"gender_id":gender_id,
							"race_id":race_id,
							"ethnicity_id":ethnicity_id,
							"veteran_id":veteran_id,
							"disability_id":disability_id,
							"time_deceased":time_deceased,
							"street":street,
							"city":city,
							"state":state,
							"zip_code":zip_code,
							"phone":phone,
							"alt_phone":alt_phone,
							"email":email,
							"communication_type_id":communication_type_id,
							"insurance_type_id":insurance_type_id,
							"emergency_contact_name":emergency_contact_name,
							"emergency_contact_phone":emergency_contact_phone,
							"emergency_contact_email":emergency_contact_email,
							"emergency_contact_type_id":emergency_contact_type_id,
							"family_id":family_id,
							"hoh_relationship_id":hoh_relationship_id,
							"employer":employer,
							"school":school,
							"congregation":congregation,
							"human_id":human_id
							}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#Update the participant data
				#If any item is 'Data not Collected' then registration is partial
				#If full registration then set the timeRegistered in the db
				full_register = True
				if gender_id == 5:
					full_register = False
				elif ssn_quality_id == 6:
					full_register = False
				elif dob_quality_id == 6:
					full_register = False
				elif race_id == 8:
					full_register = False
				elif veteran_id == 4:
					full_register = False
				#
				#
				if full_register == True:
					path = "Participants/Personal/ParticipantUpdate"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,
							"case_manager_id":case_manager_id,
							"time_retired":active}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				else:
					path = "Participants/Personal/ParticipantUpdatePartial"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,
								"case_manager_id":case_manager_id,
								"time_retired":active}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#

			except:
				transactionFailed = True
				logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants RegisterParticipantPartial Button Save")
				msg = traceback.format_exc()
				logger.error(msg)
				
			### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
			if transactionFailed:
				system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
				Refresh = 0
			### Otherwise commit 
			else:
				system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
				#Enroll in the Hope University, Guest House and Campus Store programs
				#Query will return a fault code if they are already enrolled, so just pass on fault
				try:
					#Hope University is program #29
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
					parameters = {"participantId":participant_id,"programId":29}
					enrollment_29 = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				except:
					pass	
				try:
					#Guest House is program #47
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
					parameters = {"participantId":participant_id,"programId":47}
					enrollment_47 = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				except:
					pass
				try:
					#Campus Store is program #24
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
					parameters = {"participantId":participant_id,"programId":24}
					enrollment_24 = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				except:
					pass
				
				if full_register == True:
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Participant Updated Successfully")
				else:
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Participant Updated Successfully with Data Not Collected")
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshPersonalData", payload={}, scope="session")
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshPersonalInformation", payload={}, scope="session")
			
			
			### Always close the transaction	
			system.db.closeTransaction(txId)

		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
			
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Personal Detail Edit Button Save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
